channel.title: Weather
channel.description:
What kind do you all like, or prefer.
Personally I love when it is storming out, Keeps everything cool out and the lighting is fun to watch. I sit out on my back porch with some water or a coke and just breathe the fresh rainy air, While watching the goats run for shelter.
And yes I go outside!

item.title: Weather
item.dc:creator: @sp11k3t3ht3rd sp11k3t3ht3rd
item.description:
@sp11k3t3ht3rd wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:7, topic:408300”][quote author=sp11k3t3ht3rd link=topic=509585.msg3697174#msg3697174 date=1312507146]
I have to agree to CoonHunter partly(idk how warm it is in the Mississippi gulf lol). I LOVE the snow. I hate the heat.
[/quote]
The gulf is really around 100 today, with the index (meaning how it feels because of humidity) around 115.[/quote]

Oh man… I hate it when it’s above 80 lol. I’d prefer it to be at most 70 or below in the summer (it’s not like that in Massachusetts anyway though).

Read full topic

Love stormy weather.

item.title: Weather
item.dc:creator: @OmgItsShane Shane
item.description:
@OmgItsShane wrote:

I like Spring time which is cool usually here in Kansas. Because I play Basketball and football and stuff with my friends and I sweat like hell in the summer which is scorching hot. And I don’t like to ‘freeze’ in the winter. 40-65 degree weather <3.

Read full topic
